title: Scarlett Johansson rugs up in tan coat during a casual date night with fiance Colin Jost in NYC
text:
She revealed on Monday night's episode of Jimmy Fallon that she would not allow SNL star Michael Che organize her fiance Colin Jost's bachelor party.

And ahead of the upcoming celebrations, Scarlett Johansson and Colin, 37, were spotted during a casual date night in New York City following her appearance on the show.

The 34-year-old beauty was all rugged up while her man looked dapper in his suit and tie combo.

Night out: Scarlett Johansson was spotted on a date night with her fiance Colin Jost on Monday night

Scarlett rocked a light blue T-shirt underneath a warm colored coat of an oversized fit.

She teamed the look with straight legged blue denim jeans and kept comfortable with a pair of red Converse sneakers.

The Avengers star styled her blonde tresses back into a low bun and sported a full face of glam.

Keeping warm: Scarlett rocked a light blue T-shirt underneath a warm colored coat of an oversized fit

Scarlett's makeup featured a dewy complexion with blushed cheeks and a subtle cat-eye.

Colin dressed in a suit and tie for the date and carried a large bag around with him.

The comedian was spotted with a ring on his right hand following their engagement five months ago.

Ready for an adventure: Colin dressed in a suit and tie for the date and carried a large bag around with him

She sad yes! Colin proposed to Scarlett five months ago

During an appearance on Monday night's The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, Scarlett chatted about the one rule she had for her fiance's bachelor party.

She said Colin's SNL co-star, Michael Che, was banned from planning the event.

'Oh, no. I don't think that's a good idea,' she said.

'I feel like if he throws it, it's going to be, like, by the Port Authority. And it's gonna be very local. I don't think that's a good idea.'

'Michael's not throwing it. He's not. Is this is a thing now?'

Stepping up: Colin said he hoped Michael would take the reigns on the bachelor party to which he replied: 'Yeah, I gotta do it man cause if you do it, it's gonna be boring.' 'Oh it'd be so boring. It'd be definitely in the day time and Scarlett would certainly be there'

It comes after the two comedians appeared on Jimmy Fallon together in September to discuss the upcoming party details.

Colin said he hoped Michael would take the reigns on the bachelor party to which he replied: 'Yeah, I gotta do it man cause if you do it, it's gonna be boring.'

'Oh it'd be so boring. It'd be definitely in the day time and Scarlett would certainly be there.'

When Jimmy asked what he'd plan, Michael replied: 'something dirty.'

Scarlett has been married twice before to Ryan Reynolds (from 2008 to 2011) and to French journalist, Romain Dauriac (from 2014 to 2017).

She shares her daughter Rose Dorothy Dauriac, five, with Romain.

Scarlett and Colin met on the set of Saturday Night Live and began dating in 2017.
description:
Scarlett Johansson was spotted on a date night with her fiance Colin Jost on Monday night. 
The pair walked around New York City following her appearance on Jimmy Fallon's talkshow.
